[DQR.IFRS.0102.9540] Vermögenswerte with a value of 2,680,200,000 is not equal to the combined total of Current Assets and Noncurrent assets ( 644,900,000 + 1,445,300,000 ) with a value of 2,090,200,000. These values should be equal. If assets held for sale is included in the Statement of Financial Position presentation, then consider using CurrentAssetsOtherThanAssetsOrDisposalGroupsClassifiedAsHeldForSaleOrAsHeldForDistributionToOwners instead of current assets. The properties of this ifrs-full:Assets fact are: Period :2020-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of Assets : -4 Decimals of Current Assets : -4 Decimals of Non Current Assets : -4

[DQR.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of 01 - Gewinn und Verlustrechnung but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. oesterreichischepost:ThereofIncomeFromFinancialServices, ifrs-full:ProfitLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 -

[DQR.IFRS.0126.9595] The statement 03 - Bilanz includes an inconsistent calculation. The value of the concept oesterreichischepost:FinancialAssetsFromFinancialServices of 589,500,000 should be equal to the sum of its child components defined in the calculation linkbase. The sum of these child components is 589,600,000. The values of the addends is determined by adding the values of the child concepts with a decimal value of -4. All values in the financial statements should use the same decimal value. The values reported in the financial statement in the current reporting period of 2020-12-31 should be complete if the financial statement is to be mathematically accurate and complete. The components of oesterreichischepost:FinancialAssetsFromFinancialServices that should add to 589,500,000 are comprised of the following:
+ BalancesWithBanks 10,800,000 + CashAndBankBalancesAtCentralBanks 568,100,000 + InvestmentsOtherThanInvestmentsAccountedForUsingEquityMethod 300,000 + LoansAndAdvancesToCustomers 1,700,000 + OtherFinancialAssets 8,700,000
The addends are calculated based on the calculation linkbase defined for 03 - Bilanz. If addends are missing then the calculation tree should be amended. The rule will not add dimension components as the financial statement does not include a table. If dimensions are used on the statement then add a table to ensure that the dimensions are defined correctly.
Total Element : oesterreichischepost:FinancialAssetsFromFinancialServices Total Value : 589,500,000 Total period : 2020-12-31 Dimensions : Decimals : -4 Rule Element Id:9595 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/529900MVUWACNUTK8467/2020-12-31/ESEF/AT/0/oesterreichischepost2020.zip/oesterreichischepost2020/reports/oesterreichischepost.xhtml 17598

[DQR.IFRS.0126.9595] The statement 04 - Kapitalflussrechnung includes an inconsistent calculation. The value of the concept oesterreichischepost:GrossCashFlow of 327,100,000 should be equal to the sum of its child components defined in the calculation linkbase. The sum of these child components is 327,300,000. The values of the addends is determined by adding the values of the child concepts with a decimal value of -4. All values in the financial statements should use the same decimal value. The values reported in the financial statement in the current reporting period of 2020-01-01 to 2020-12-31 should be complete if the financial statement is to be mathematically accurate and complete. The components of oesterreichischepost:GrossCashFlow that should add to 327,100,000 are comprised of the following:
- ProfitBeforeTax -162,100,000 + AdjustmentsForDepreciationAndAmortisationExpense 142,200,000 - AdjustmentsForUndistributedProfitsOfAssociates 1,500,000 + OtherAdjustmentsForNoncashItems 24,500,000 + OtherAdjustmentsToReconcileProfitLoss 0
The addends are calculated based on the calculation linkbase defined for 04 - Kapitalflussrechnung. If addends are missing then the calculation tree should be amended. The rule will not add dimension components as the financial statement does not include a table. If dimensions are used on the statement then add a table to ensure that the dimensions are defined correctly.

+ BorrowingsFromBanks 11,800,000 + DepositsFromCustomers 519,500,000 + OtherFinancialLiabilities 1,500,000
